Text.Language: Lwiji niben ethwou maren,au n~cwn marentoubo n~nenh/t e~qoun e~v~ran m~P[oic.
All evil excuses, let us place behind us, let us purify our hearts, in the name of the Lord.

Mare v~ran m~P[oic swpi n~q~r/i n~q/ten n~tef erouwini e~ron qen penrwmi etcaqoun.
May the name of the Lord be within us, to enlighten us in our inner luminosity.
